prev.excerpt: How about a Twitter Bot that retweets, favorites, on the basis of hashtags and replies to other users if they follow it? I made a similar kind of a Twitter Bot  (@nodejstweet)  that feeds me the latest or the ongoing news/articles/how-to’s on a set…

next.excerpt: The  process  object is a one of the few global objects provided by the Node.js core API. It can be access from anywhere, thus its methods can also be accessed. Such is a method called process.nextTick() which is used by developers in realtime…
